text: Allur or Alluru or Alloor or Allooru may refer to: ==Places in India== *Alor, Bastar, a village in Kondagaon district, Chhattisgarh *Allur, Gulbargha, a village in Gulbarga district, Karnataka *Alluru, Krishna District, a village in Krishna district, Andhra Pradesh *Allur, Nellore district, a village in Nellore district, Andhra Pradesh *Allur, Prakasam, a village in Prakasam district, Andhra Pradesh *Allur, Tiruchirappalli district, a village in Tiruchirappalli district, Tamil Nadu
title: Allur
